text: [Music]
to do the piper once upon a time there
lived a poor peasant with his wife and
children they all worked hard in the
fields to earn the little bread they had
all of them worked hard except the
farmers youngest son to do to do would
lie in bed all day and showed no
interest in troubling himself with any
work no matter how much his family
nagged him if the nagging became too
much to do would retire to the forest
there he would either sleep in the
pleasant shade of the trees or play on
his food one day as he was playing the
flute thus a man walked by how
beautifully you play the flute thank you
I wish I could just sit and play and not
do a shred of work in my life
and become the richest man in the whole
kingdom no dream ever comes true when
one is idle young man no man that ever
lived became rich without work but I
hate to work why don't you play on your
flute or pipes for people around
I have no pipes and I have no money to
buy them either play on your flute then
soon you shall have enough money to buy
pipes so
started playing on his flute for the
people of his village he played so
beautifully that people happily put
coins into his house and soon to do had
enough money to buy a grand
set of pipes he played the pipes even
better than the flute and there was no
village for 20 villages around where to
do was not invited to play at weddings
and pheromones to do we have never heard
such sweet music in our lives I don't
know of any amount that would do justice
to your art but for now please accept a
thousand gold coins for your performance
thank you sir
one would think that all the wealth
would have made to do happy but it only
made him greedier
it was long since he left home and
instead of going back to his family he
decided to go to the famed land of Kula
it was said that every family in Kula
was richer than 50 Kings put together my
money where is all my money gone imagine
if I play in Kugler high will become so
rich so to do packed his treasures and
his pipes and went to [ __ ] that went to
kunda but to do refused to buy the
ticket flying he had no money when
clearly he had more than enough excuse
me sir your ticket please I do not have
one sorry I cannot let you in without a
ticket
I am a poor man I would have bought the
ticket if I could I am sorry
one of the sailors on the ship knew to
do he had heard him play on his pipes he
secretly called out to him Shh
over here aren't you the famous player
of the pipes yes you should have more
than enough money to buy the ticket what
since I know how well you play I will
let you come in at night you must jump
into the water and swim behind the boat
I will arrange for the captain to pull
you up you must tell the captain that
you swam all the way behind the ship to
do had become so miserly that he agreed
to the strange plan and at night he came
out of the sailors cabin and jumped into
the water
the sailors shouted there is a man
swimming behind the ship there is a man
swimming behind the ship but he appears
to be drowning quick get the ropes to
pull him up quick help oh they Pope to
do up into the ship how did you get here
since you did not allow me to enter the
ship without a ticket I swam behind it
but now I was losing my strength had you
not pulled me up I would have certainly
drowned you swam all this way for more
than eight hours I did not know you were
this desperate to go to Cumbre come
travel with us so to do was allowed into
the ship and a day or two
the ship anchored at Condon to do walked
into the streets of Kula and was amazed
to see houses with gates made of gold
people riding in carriages studded with
precious stones even the ordinary
vendors in the markets looked like rich
nobleman and princes and princesses I
can make a fortune here come and Googler
a Scullion can earn ten times more than
what a musician would earn anywhere else
to do hurt that and decided that if a
scallion earned more than a musician a
scallion he would become he does
abandoned his pipes and got himself a
job in a grand mansion after a month of
working Gus I am happy with your
services here is your salary in a month
to do had earned ten times more than he
would have earned in a year but the more
money to do got the more he wanted he
had become so greedy and miserly that he
stopped buying new clothes such that his
old ones were worn out and torn one day
his master saw you Scullion better go
and buy new clothes or else you may
leave this house I shall not have
servants who look so impoverished in my
house people will think that I do not
pay you well and that I shall not allow
when to do hurt his master at Monash him
vas his heart became miserable he longed
for all the praise and respect he once
had in his native village he sought to
soothe his ailing heart near the lake of
the town as he was sitting staring into
the water a familiar face reflected in
to do looked up it was the same man who
had advised him to start playing music
you I see that you remember me
you're a hunger for money has not wiped
out my memory from your mind I have all
the money but I long for respect how
will you be happy as a Scullion when
your heart is with music you gave up the
talent you have been blessed with for a
few extra coins it is not lack of
respect that ails you it is your grief
that hurts you what should I do
you show me the way once please show it
to me again the way is the same forget
the greed of money and start playing
again but do not ask for money for your
performances you will see that you shall
be rewarded well but I am out of
practice I do not know if I shall be
able to play as well as I used to
how unfortunate are you to fritter away
such a beautiful talent you have
practice I am sure that you will become
as good as you were before you have
enough money for your upkeep till then I
shall do as you say so
to do went back to practicing on his
pipes and before long he was as good and
even better than what he had been before
so sweet was his music that the rich
folk of Kula rewarded him with treasures
until to do was one of the richest men
there
but by now to do was a changed man he
longed to go back home to his family
so he bought a ship and began to sail
home with his treasures but alas the
ship was caught in a huge storm and went
down taking fortunately though to do was
saved and washed ashore on a strange
Island where am I did I lose everything
in the storm to do was hungry and
explored the island to find something to
eat he soon came to a tree full of
apples and another with clusters of
hazelnut he picked both he was very
hungry he went back to the beach to have
his meal but as soon as he took a few
bites of the Apple his nose grew so long
that it almost touched his feet what is
this must I live like this now in a
dizzy he grabbed the hazelnut and
gobbled a few to his relief he found
that his nose became alright again these
are magic fruits at least I shall not
starve here I do not care for my
treasures for ifsc money can make life
comfortable but it cannot relieve the
pains of the heart but I do wish I had
my pipes to play suddenly the sky
rumbled in
and to do saw the face of the man in the
sky to do I am so happy that you have
finally learned what is more important
in life and that you are not sad at
losing your wealth
hence I give you back your pipes you
shall soon be rescued
there is a king in the kingdom of
Riviera he is arrogant and thinks that
he and his family are the most beautiful
people on earth
he has imprisoned people just because he
thought they were well-dressed enough
use these apples and nuts to teach him a
lesson and earn enough to go back home
to do made two baskets in a rush he
filled one with the apples and the other
with the nuts and waited soon he saw a
ship come in the distance to do waved
out to the ship and was rescued the ship
anchored on a kingdom called Rivera to
do disguised himself in such a way that
no one would have recognized him he took
the basket of apples and went to the
palace fresh crisp sweet juicy eyeballs
as golden as the Sun fresh crisp sweet
juicy apples as golden as the Sun now
the cook had just been looking for
apples to make an apple crumble for the
royal family so he called out to do hey
come here Apple sell all your apples
good enough to be self to the king oh
you shall have never seen finer apples
than these take a look and satisfy
yourself did you look him perception Ali
good very well I sure take to you do
your best get to do hurriedly took the
money and rushed out of there lest the
cook try a bite of an apple himself a
few days past and to do waited patiently
soon there were rumours of the royal
family having fallen sick
and then one day there was an
announcement listen all a special
message from the palace the royal family
hails with a strange illness born out of
apples the sickness does not threaten
their lives but it is strange and
affects their noses
whosoever can bring them the medicine to
cure it shall have half the kingdom to
do hurt this made a powder of the nuts
and disguised himself as a doctor he
went to the palace of the nuts I have a
cure for the Kings illness let the
family have five spoonfuls each of this
and they should be fine by morning
but of course the royal family got rid
of their long noses and the king offered
to do his reward you have cured us and I
shall honor my promise of the reward but
I want to give you something more than
just half my kingdom what do you desire
sire I hear you have imprisoned people
just because you thought that they
weren't well dressed enough free them
your highness yes indeed my arrogance of
being sophisticated and well dressed is
humbled forever and I have already asked
for all those prisoners to be released
what else can I do for you other than
give you half my kingdom I do not want
half your kingdom your highness just let
me have a ship to sail home and enough
money to buy a few acres of land very
well so the king gave to do one of his
best ships and filled it with a treasure
such that to do went home bought a huge
piece of land built a mansion on it and
lived there happily ever after with his
family playing on his pipes he shared
his wealth with the needy and
is never again lazy or greedy riches and
beauty can perish but talent and hard
work will never leave you
